title: Attacks on Mariupol steelworks intensify as Russia looks to end standoff; fate of Ukraine's Donbas in the balance. Follow our live updates
content:
1. Attacks on Mariupol steelworks intensify as Russia looks to end standoff; fate of Ukraine's Donbas in the balance. Follow our live updates  CNBC
  2. 'Heavy, bloody battles' as Russian troops break into steel plant; 600 reportedly died in Mariupol theater bombing: Live updates  USA TODAY
  3. Ukraine live news: Zelenskyy calls for truce for Azovstal rescue  Al Jazeera English
  4. Azovstal steel plant evacuees never arrived in Zaporizhzhia, Mariupol mayor says  Fox News
  5. Ukraine says Russian forces storm Mariupol steel plant; Biden visits missile plant  KPIX CBS SF Bay Area
  6. View Full Coverage on Google News

localize.title: マリウポリ製鉄所への攻撃は、ロシアが膠着状態を終わらせるために強化され、ウクライナのドンバスの運命がかかっている。ライブアップデートをご覧ください。
俄罗斯希望结束对峙，对马里乌波尔钢铁厂的攻击加剧；乌克兰顿巴斯的命运岌岌可危。关注我们的实时更新
俄羅斯希望結束對峙，對馬裏烏波爾鋼鐵廠的攻擊加劇；烏克蘭頓巴斯的命運岌岌可危。關注我們的實時更新
